## ERC1155Wrappable type

Represents a certain amount of ERC1155 NFTs that can be wrapped

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ERC1155Wrappable = {
  contractAddress: string;
  quantity: Amount;
  tokenId: BigNumberish;
};
```

**References:** [Amount](./sdk.amount.md)
